original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1221)@</color>  在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4874)@</color> 秒內隨機提升全體我方武將 <color=#ccffcc>24%</color> 所有抗性和 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4879)@</color> 點武力以及智力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1221)@</color> In <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4874)@</color> Within seconds Randomly increase all our military generals <color=#ccffcc>24%</color> all resistances and <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4879)@</color> points of strength and intelligence.
